#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<set>
#include<string>
#include<cmath>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<map>
using namespace std;
main()
{
	int t;
	long long int n;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{	
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		if(n==1)
		cout<<"0\n";
		else if(n%2==0)
		printf("%lld\n",(n*n-2)/2);
		else if(n%2!=0)
		printf("%lld\n",(n*n-3)/2);
	}
}
